title: Big Batch Manhattan Cocktails
full_text:
Big Batch Manhattan Cocktails
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
8
to 10 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
18
ounces
rye whiskey
9
ounces
sweet vermouth
18
dashes
Angostura bitters
5
ounces
filtered or bottled
water
(something neutral, not mineral water)
Garnishes: cocktail cherries and
lemon twists
Directions
Using a funnel, pour rye, vermouth, bitters, and water into bottle or pitcher. Close the bottle and chill well. Keep on ice or keep in fridge.
Special Equipment
32 or liter-sized swingtop bottle or lidded pitcher
Whiskey
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
